title: [Question]few doubts regarding ece placements
content: I have just started my second year ece and am genuinely interested in getting placed in the core sector, i want to know what are the necessary steps i need to take and shd i consider writing GATE?

comments.body:
it depends on your interest if you want to write GATE, if you have masters plan you can write 

for ECE core placements, you need to focus on mainly core knowledge and core subjects like in the V.L.S.I domain
